Your teacher asks you to write about what you do in your free time.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about:<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * the things you do in your free time<U+00A0><U+00A0> * when you do these things.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> <U+00A0>Write about 40 words.

In addition to studying at university,  I have free time to do more things, you know. I love to drawing, playing the flute. I think that if you have free time, you should learn anything else different with you study at  university. It's good for you, and I see that. You won't waste your time on the  internet. I have been doing it until now. And sometimes I will draw and play the flute, after class, or when I have inspired.

It is the start of a new school year at your school. Your English teacher asks you to write a report about what you want to achieve in this new school year. You should write about: The areas of your learning you are pleased with. The areas of your learning you want to improve. What you will do to achieve your goals.

The first day at school is coming and I m anxious to see my old and new buddies for this new school year . My vacations were awesome but now I should be aware of the last year of my school time and put all my effort to get my goals and overcome my weakness  , I finish it,  gosh! Time goes by so quickly .  I feel confident and secure about my learning , I feel pleased with the education that I have received  lately and I believe that I master all of the areas  at good levels, not only History , Economics , Geography  but also Sciencies areas such as Physics and Chemestry . Even though I expect to bursh up my English wrting this year, I got cofused sometimes when I have to write long one paragraphs, anyway , I must be ready to conclude my secondary studies with success and to  overcome this difficulty and get my goals  , I think , I have to use  techonlogy and look for  some free apps available online  that allow me to practise and receive feedback at once and check my mistakes and correct them and in this way to obtain my goals.

You receive this email from your English pen friend: Hi, It was my birthday on Saturday. I went with my family to a restaurant. After the meal they all sang Happy Birthday to me and we had a cake with candles. What do people do to celebrate birthdays in your country? Is it the same or different? Write soon! Jack Write an email to your friend.

Hi Jack, Thank you for your email. Polish birthday parties appear to look like yours. We take our families and friends to a restaurant, where children have a place to dance and adults can chat a bit. Moreover, we also eat cake and blow out the candles, which number depends on how old is a birthday person. Parallelly we sing a 'Happy Birthday' of course in Polish, because I am from a Polish-speaking country.  I hope we celebrate our next birthday together. Regards, Marta

It is the start of a new school year at your school. Your English teacher asks you to write a report about what you want to achieve in this new school year. You should write about: The areas of your learning you are pleased with. The areas of your learning you want to improve. What you will do to achieve your goals.

 The new school year has just started, so it's the best moment to think of what do I want to achieve and improve in the new school year.      I am completly satisfied with my mathematic skills. I am also keen on physics and biology, especially units about biotechnologic. But it doesn't means that I am perfect and I don't need to learn anymore. Just because I am pleased with those, it doesn't mean that I cannot be better. To be honest I must say that chemistry is not my cup of tea. I also know that I have to improve my English. I would practise my language everyday, but I stopped one year ago, because I had thought that I didn't need to do it. I was wrong. We should push our boundaries more and more.  That's why I'll join the English extra-curricular activities. All I want to achieve is greater level of my language, because I know I can do this. I have to motivate myself to do something more, so maybe I will borrow my friends' notes and book about chemistry, then learning would be easier.      I think that everyone should be that motivated. Let's learn!

Write about a holiday that you went on that was really important to you. Say where you went and what you saw, and explain why it was the best holiday you ever had.

     This year I was in New Zeland. It was unforgettable experience for me, I had always wanted to see for example place called Matamata. It's the small island which belongs to New Zeland. The Lord of the rings was directed there, so there is a Hobbit village the most unusual landmark in that area. New Zeland has also fresh air, it's a big deal for someone who live in Poland like me, so I was just walking and I started a Nordic walking in beautiful mountains. The views were breathtaking, I made thousands of photos during my holiday. I was doing lot of sports, so I lost some pounds, so there is another advantage of active holiday. What about disadvantages? I cannot say that anything went wrong, everything was just as I planned and it was really motivating. To be honest there is one thing I didn't like. A very long journey by a plane. It took 10 hours. For me it's too much, but if someone doesn't care, holidays like this are without any disadvantages.

Many people believe that it is important to always tell the truth. In your opinion, is it ever acceptable to tell a lie?<U+00A0> Explain your answer giving reasons and specific examples.

Dignity is the best quality for humans, if someone wants to become a really good person, it will be essential to be honest in all aspects of  life, such as being hard worker, good friend between friends, helping people each time that it can be possible do it, not injuring someone, at least conciously, or paying attention to need from others. Our honestity will result seriously affected if we tell lies; Many people believe that it is important to always tell the truth, but in my opinion. there are some occasions when it is better do not tell exactly the truth, all the truth, because we can be talking about a painful topic about, or not be not the appropriate person to communicate all that we know, however It does not mean that we must tell a lie, other possible situation is to have to tell a harmless lie, a white lie, to be polite and kind with a person, or in a particular situation; this is not to tell lies for me, it could be not to thell exactly the truth, but it would not be a serious sin.  In my opinion, lies are the most pernicious things for good relationships, and I will always be against them, because if I told hard lies I could be considered as a betrayer for anyone.

Write an email to your English friend. In your email, tell your friend about your favourite film. What kind of film is it? What is it about? Do you think your friend would like the film?

Hello, dear Francis.   Yesterday, I saw Andrei Tarkovsy's Stalker. I really love that movie. But it is a very difficult film to see. The first thing that you have to consider is the three characters of the movie (the writer, the stalker and the proffesor). Each character is a representation of the evolution of science and philosofy. Another very important point of the movie is 'the zone', it is like a mystical region when the three guys found God. Tarkovsy spoke in this move about the decadence of the modern world

You receive this email from your English pen friend, Matt. _Hi there,_ _It is the end of the holidays and we will start school again on Monday. In this new school year, I need to work very hard because I will have exams. I must improve in Maths and History. And you? You said you want to improve your English. What will you do to improve it? Good luck!_ _Matt_ Write to Matt and tell him what you will do to improve your English in this new school year.

Hi Matt,   I'm glad that you're ok. Good luck with your studies.   Yes' I have to improve my writing and speaking skills for my English test, because I'm going to take it in two months. I was studying with different webpages, but the last month I found a very good one: Cambrige para todos.   As soon as I'll purchase a better calification in my English test, I'll apply to a Canadian university. It is so exciting, I hope to evolve soon.   Jose

You receive this email from your English pen friend: Hi, It was my birthday on Saturday. I went with my family to a restaurant. After the meal they all sang Happy Birthday to me and we had a cake with candles. What do people do to celebrate birthdays in your country? Is it the same or different? Write soon! Jack Write an email to your friend.

Hi Jack,  Happy birthday to you.  In my country we have a similar celebration, and it is strange because we sing Happy Birthday too, but we vary the lyrics and we add Spanish words. People prepares cakes and biscuits and makes parties, it is a very common way to celebrate.  Jose.

Last week you went on a trip with some students from your class. Write an email to your friend, Billal. In your email:<U+00A0><U+00A0> * say where you went<U+00A0><U+00A0> * say what you did<U+00A0> * say why you enjoyed the trip.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about 80 words.

Hi,  Last week we went to the Macarena's national park in Santander. It is a huge park with an interesting variety of ecosistems inside. My students were exciting and they wanted to see all the beauty parts of the park. As soon as we arrived we went to and fro and look for animals and strange plants. Although he didn't find anything spectacular, they learnt about Colombian nature and history, because there is a national museum in the park. That was so nice.   I enjoyed it when we went to camping in the night. It was so special, because it is a lightless park so the stars in the sky are brigther than the city.  See you next week, Billial.  Jose.

Your teacher asks you to write about what you do in your free time.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about:<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * the things you do in your free time<U+00A0><U+00A0> * when you do these things.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> <U+00A0>Write about 40 words.

Hello teacher. In my free time I play guitar and I learn different languages, because I really love these two activities. After working I do these two activities because I don't have any different time in the whole day. I divided my week per days, Monday, Wednesday and Friday is for guitar, and the other three days is for languages.   Chiefly, I combined these two activities in my learning process. I tried to learn haw to sing in different lengauges, but it is so complicaded, not just for learn a new way to sing, it is difficult because my voice is inadeguate.

Your friend Leyla had a birthday party yesterday. Leyla invited you to the party but you couldn<U+2019>t go. Write a note to Leyla. In your note:<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * tell her why you couldn<U+2019>t go to the party<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * ask her what happened at the party<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * invite her to do something with you next weekend.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about 70 words.

Hello Leyla,   I'm overjoyed for your invitation, but I couldn't go. Although I wanted to be with you in this special moment, for me was impossible to me because my wife told me that we had to visit her parents, who were celebrating fifty years of marriage. So we went to the party in Tocancipa.   But tell me: How was the party? What did you do? Who did you met? I hope that it was a special moment to you.   If you want Leyla We can go to the Rodrigo's restaurant the next weekend.

Write a paragraph for a brochure about your home town. You must include TWO of these things: <U+00B7> Information about **important landmarks** <U+00B7> Information about **shopping** and **accommodation** <U+00B7> Information about **parks, museums** and **restaurants** <U+00B7> Information about **night-time entertainment.**

I live in a hometown at the foot of the mountains which is very peaceful with fresh air, imnense hills and mountians. what I MOST IN MY CONTRYSIDE IS the night-time entertainment with lots of fun activities, clothes stalls, sidewalk eateries. everyone lots of fun eating and drinking after a working day. And to mention a famous restaurant with simples dishes such as fishes, vegetables,... made very simple but delicious different from restaurants in big cities.  and especially the price is very reasonable.

Last week you went on a trip with some students from your class. Write an email to your friend, Billal. In your email:<U+00A0><U+00A0> * say where you went<U+00A0><U+00A0> * say what you did<U+00A0> * say why you enjoyed the trip.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about 80 words.

Dear Billa. I went to vung tau beach. what I found more than I imaged . after taking a break, I participated in many activitIes with my friends like swimming which is indepensible when you HAVE Ycame a beach, then we skydiving, surfing together. I enjoyed this trip cause I connect more with friends and have more new experience.

Your town council is thinking about banning the use of mobile phones on public transport and in shops and restaurants.<U+00A0> Write a letter to the town council giving your opinion about this and why you think it is or is not a good idea.

Dear Town Council  I am writing in connection with your idea of banning the use of mobile phones on public transport and in shops and restaurants. I would like to point out a few issues that I have with the solution you have created.  I think that this amendment could have a bad impact on youger part of our society as well as on the other part of residences of our city. Nowadays phones are very crucial in our lives, therefore banning the use of them can discourage people from using public transport, moreover shopping market can go into reccesion, because people would be more willing to buy things via the Internet, without supporting local bussinesses which can lead to their bankruptcy. On the other hand, I support banning use of mobile phones in restaurants. I find that possibility  to talk to each other without using mobile phones might increase integration of the people between them. Furthermore, mobile phones are unreplecable for instance in case of emergency.  To conclude, I believe you will make a good decision and I hope that you are going to do more research prior making the right decision. Even though I cannot agree with your idea, I am sure that with a few improvements it can be considered as a good move of our authorities.  Yours faithfully

Some people believe zoos are good places for people to learn about animals. Other people believe animals belong in nature and it is wrong to keep them in zoos. What do you think? Explain, giving specific reasons for your choice.

As human beings we like to live in groups or belonging a society in this reason matches exactly with the animals so I am for both ideas even though they are contradictory . Let me to point out some ideas.  The first point is  to highlight that all animals deserve to be free and in their habitats , however , it is well knonw that most of them , especially wild animals such as tigers, lions and other big felines are haunted by insane hunters to trade their fur and organs , in other  words, we have to keep endangered  animals in safe places and one of this place are the zoos .  Another point to discuss is that all alive organisms must live in its habitats in order to develop and survive properly , in contrast,  the constantly growing of  all the cities have not avoid destroying vast natural areas affecting negative  these natural habitats  In summary we must keep in  mind  our responsibilities with nature and make the best options to keep a balance between nature and socienty.

Some people believe zoos are good places for people to learn about animals. Other people believe animals belong in nature and it is wrong to keep them in zoos. What do you think? Explain, giving specific reasons for your choice.

I love animals, and I would always want the best for them, sometimes I think animals are better than people, or at least nobler, because animals only kill for food or for defender themselves, their puppies or their territory while men are able to kill for pleasure. Similarly, I believe that wild animals should live freely, in the wild, in their environment. Zoos are not a good place for wild animals in my opinion, especially traditional and ancient zoos  where animals stay imprisoned in a small cage, suffering high levels of anxiety and misbehavior from visitors, modern parks are a very different option where animals have large spaces just for them while visitors can see them from a distance without disturbing them, but I really think the best thing for animals is to live in absolute freedom in the places where they were born in their natural environment surrounded from other wild animals as they lived long ago. Other very important thing is to take care of them, and I agree that it is easier in a zoo with vets close to them, but this is also possible to do it in a bigger space, perhaps with a big effort but possible due to the existence of poachers that represent a real danger and from whom it is necessary to protect the animals.

Some students choose to study in another country for a time during high school or university. What do you think are the advantages and disadvantages of studying abroad?

In these days it is more and more habitual that young people choose to study in another country for a more or less long period of  time during high school or university, this decision has advantages and disadvantages. For many students there would be an economic  problem, because the most of them try to study in a university close the house of their parents to save money having the ability to come home every weekend for food for the week, moreover a univerity placed in a small town must be cheaper than in a foreign country, in addition to this, it is always possible that not all students feel desire to live abroad. On the other hand it could be very interesting for young students to live alone in another country away from their families, inmerse in a different culture having the possibility to learn a new language and meet other people and perhaps following a different method in their studies, and the most important for me, living by themselves. In my opinion, I believe that if it is possible, it will be better the option of going to study in another country for a time before endind studies.

Some students choose to study in another country for a time during high school or university. What do you think are the advantages and disadvantages of studying abroad?

Nowadays there are many opportunities to study abroad and there are not barriers to stop this tendency and most universities especially American and Europeans offer scholarships or special discounts on undergraduates and graduates programmes . Regarding the question I have some advantages and disadvanatges to mention in this paragraph . About the first point I consider advantages to learn a new language and culture, these new elements help you to adapt to the new context where you are in and make you able to deal with your academic life . Secondly , being abroad gives you a new perspective of life and you feel renovated in your thoughts and finally you  can have more chances to improve personally, maybe  you can have more possibilities to get a job and keep on studying a postgraduate course . For disadvantages, I can tell the difficulties to adapt to the new way of life and this is common and natural but many ttimes this can become hard  to overcome for the students and another point is to  live alone for a long time , most exchange students live in small rooms and they have limitations to interact with other studnets.  In summary studying abroad has advantages and disadvantages and the most important is to balance those features and look for the best options to over come them .

Write an email to your English friend. In your email, tell your friend about your favourite film. What kind of film is it? What is it about? Do you think your friend would like the film?

The conversation between actresses is nice, so you will love it. Will you go to Tokyo to watch the movie with me next Sunday if the weather is good? I am looking forward to hearing from you.

We also had a cake with candles that was the number of the same years old. Moreover,I got a present from my parents. It was a lovely watch. I will send the picture of it.

Your friend Leyla had a birthday party yesterday. Leyla invited you to the party but you couldn<U+2019>t go. Write a note to Leyla. In your note:<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * tell her why you couldn<U+2019>t go to the party<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * ask her what happened at the party<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * invite her to do something with you next weekend.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about 70 words.

Hi Leyla, Congratulations on your birthday. When I was told to participate in the party, I was so delightful. However, I could not spend the day together you because I stayed foreign country for business trip, so I feel so sorry. I want to know your father's speech. He is a famous writer, so his speech must have been wonderful. I am planning to invite you next weekend. Please show me what your father said to you.

Write about a holiday that you went on that was really important to you. Say where you went and what you saw, and explain why it was the best holiday you ever had.

Last summer, I went to Nha Trang beach with my family, that trip was a memorable summer vacation. We travelled by car, and when I got quite nearly this place, I could see how beautiful and vast that the sea has. The weather was wonderful that made me want to run straight to the sea, enjoying the fresh air and the blue water. There were a lot of people here for swimming, sunbathing, playing volleyball, the kids building sand and flying the kites. We stayed in the elde’s hotel, their services made me so satisfied and I had the chance to eat seafood there, they looked so fresh. I also went to Vinpearl Land. Those are place were awesome. I felt very happy because I was met so many foreigners, they were tourists and I have many interesting conversations with them. We stayed in Nha Trang a week and finally, I went to the souvenir shop near the beach to buy some gifts for my grandparents and my friends. When I went back home, I felt a little regretful cause I want to stay there a little longer.  I hope I can travel Nha Trang one more time in the future.

Last week you went on a trip with some students from your class. Write an email to your friend, Billal. In your email:<U+00A0><U+00A0> * say where you went<U+00A0><U+00A0> * say what you did<U+00A0> * say why you enjoyed the trip.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about 80 words.

Hello Billal, Last Sunday, I visited Disneyland with four classmates. We got up very early and wait the entrance gate. As soon as the gate opened, we rushed into the attraction facility that we tagetted. The place is very popular, so it is difficult to get the tickets. We were able to get the tickets and enjoyed so much. At lunch time, we ate lots of delicious meals. In the evening, we saw the parade and get back home. We had a great time.

In some schools, students must study music and learn to play a musical instrument. In other schools, studying music may not be required or there may be no music classes at all. Do you think all students should have to study music? Support your opinion with reasons and examples.

When I was child studying music was compulsory. I think be able playing an instrument is a good way to develop matematic and  artistic skills especially during childhood. Furthermore I love music, in fact I would learning a musical instrument, you know? Never is too late. But I can imagine that not everybody like to play an instrument, so do too study music is not an essential subject, it would be not compulsory. For instance, if some students doesn't like studying music at school could avoid doing music lessons but them should choose another not compulsory subject  subject that they prefer. In my opinion learnig music or another artistic subject is important due too nowadays there are too much technicians subjects and a little bit of artistic or humanistic subjects that are important for the behaviour and the umanistic knowledge of the students that in the future will represent the values of society.

Why is learning the English language important to you? I wish you luck! Ana **Write an email to Ana and answer her question.**

Hello Ana, As you know, I study English every day. I want to go to Singapore next year because special vocational training course will be held in the country. The program required English ability, so I need to improve my English. I think that I can raise my career through this experience. Do you agree?  All the best Ken

In some schools, students must study music and learn to play a musical instrument. In other schools, studying music may not be required or there may be no music classes at all. Do you think all students should have to study music? Support your opinion with reasons and examples.

Tha last decades have brought new ideas to provide to ways to educate our citizens with new completary courses,not only music courses but also sports and crafts courses and I consider that these courses should be optional and taken by people who are keen on them in order to develop their abilities in these areas. it was tested  by many investigations that courses like music, sports and cooking foster values such as discipline , team work and confidence.  Regarding the first point , discipline is reinforced when people not onlye  play some instruments but also when they practise any sports because required steady practices and dedication to get succeed and to be considered the  best musician or sporty.  The second point is related to team work , even though one person can start working alone with an instrument, playing a sport or even cooking , you end becoming a group which requieres the performance of each element to achieve a unique goal as a team .  The last  point but not least important, is about  feeling confidence in what you do and some courses bring and promote these values and theses  courses are  music , sport or crafts.  In summary  not only music but also sports or crafts have a tremendous benefit in our students.

Video games are very popular with children. However, some parents feel that video games can have a negative impact on their children, but others believe that they may have some positive effects. How do you feel about children playing video games? Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.

Some people say that video games is harmful regarding health and education. Playing video games decreases the time of physical exercise and homework. However, I am against this. I would like to state the reasons. First, I think that  playing video games does not cause of reducing the time of exercise. If children do not play video games, they might not exercise. The circumstances that they want to try training is needed. Second, Playing video games is sometimes educational. There are some useful games that children can grow up. At present, society is more competitive, so it is difficult to play outside. IT technology improves and Internet affects the life of children, so video games is inevitable. Otherwise I accept that video games have the tendency of additive, so it is important to make rules regarding playing video games. Orginally, playing is not non-moral. It is useful because it makes change the pace and relaxed.

You have recently had a class discussion about the importance of taking care of your health. Now your English teacher has asked you to write an essay giving your opinions on the following statement: _It is more important to be healthy than to be rich._ Write your **essay.**

Picture this: A woman who is a billionaire, lives in the biggest house of the neighboorhoud and has everything she could think of.  However is this woman not able to walk, due to an accident that has happened years ago. Next to the woman lives another Woman, who is quiet poor, lives in the smallest house in the neighboorhood and has just enough money to buy the necessary things. But this woman is healthy and able to do everything.  Who is the most happy and is the most fortunate?  A good health is the most important thing in our lives. Without that we are always dependent on others and aren't able to do normal things like walking or go shopping. WIth a bad health aren't we able we meet new people or learn new things. All sort of things that depend if you're happy or not.   Some people who are rich will spend all their money to buy the biggest house, drive the newest car or walk in the coolest clothes. But how can they enjoy all this if they aren't able to do this with their bad health. They can't buy a good health, can they?   So to conclude all this: You may have a lot of money, but you aren't able to enjoy it when you're health isn't good.

Some people believe zoos are good places for people to learn about animals. Other people believe animals belong in nature and it is wrong to keep them in zoos. What do you think? Explain, giving specific reasons for your choice.

Previously, there was a hummster in my house. All my family loved her, but The hummster looked like to go outside. One day, at last she went out and we got lost. Some people say that animals should live naturally. However I am against these ideas. I am going to explain as follows: First, to live with animals is useful for education. The dogs that they have been in my house taught me a lot involving brave and importance of lives and so on. Moreover, they gave me good memorials. Second, zoos are important in tourism. All Japanese people love Panda, so when a baby of Giant Panda, Japanese poeople was enthudiastic about that. The effectness of the economy was so great because consume grew up. Of course, zoos have disadvantage points. I think keeping of Balance is very important. The hummster that had escaped came back home next to the day. Our family was very peased.

* What do you do in your free time? How often do you do it? * What do you like about that activity and why? * Tell us about the last time you did this.

In my free time I read and sometimes I watch movies. I read quite a lot especially when I travel. I carry novel with me and  try to complete it during my journey.  Ever since I started reading more and more variety in topics I have observed that my knowledge and imagination have improved a lot. I have developed a clear understanding of issues and subjects . Reading various books and articles has opened up new horizon for me and I enjoy it.  Last week when I was travelling to my friend's home town, it was a single day journey. I took train from the nearby railway station, reached  my reserved seat and after unloading myself I started reading a love story which I wanted to read from long time and finally I completed it by the time I reached my destination.

Write an email to your English friend. In your email, tell your friend about your favourite film. What kind of film is it? What is it about? Do you think your friend would like the film?

Video games are very popular with children. However, some parents feel that video games can have a negative impact on their children, but others believe that they may have some positive effects. How do you feel about children playing video games? Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.

Video games are one of the most important industry since the end of the 20th century. From the mere leisure at home controlled by parents, it evolved to a real way of life difficult to keep under control with the developing of the Internet and the numbers of screens or other devices in our age .  Moreover, the marketing strategies of the video game companies aim to attract and keep people's attention. Currently, we see attention war between all theses companies. In spite of the evolution, some parents can see a  benefit by using it as way of education. Taking a look at the video game history, we can measure its positive and negative impacts.  At the beginning, the video allowed children to have fun during their free time. In fact, each child had his game device at home and could play alone or with friends. In this period, mobile phones, internet and network didn't exist. Children had to go to a specialized shop with their parents to buy each video games. Download didn't exist. Also, the small number of screens present at home allows parents to keep this activity  under control. They were able to answer to the following questions : ・Who my child is playing with? ・How long my child is playing? ・What sort of game my child is playing with? So, at the beginning, video game appeared as a good way to make new friends.   The developing of Internet changed the rules at the end of the 90's. Indeed, children have now the possibilty to when, where and how they want. Parents have now a lot of difficulties to keep an eye on their children practiced due to the increasing of devices. From a way to make real new friends, nework allows us to play with virtual unkonwon friends coming from all the world. Currently, it is almost impossible for the parents to answer to the 3 questions see above.  However, some parents take advantage of this situation. Internet offers  new ways to improve skills and ability. Children can learn speaking language or playing an instrument thanks to the Internet and educative video games.  To conclude, video games can benefit to children if their parents control the practice and offer other activities to maintain good health, physics and mental.

A well-known magazine for English language learners has asked for reviews from readers about useful resources for learning English. You have recently discovered Write and Improve, a new writing tool for learners of English. Write a review for the magazine describing the main features of the tool and why it is/isn<U+2019>t helpful. Include details about what you like about the tool and about any difficulties you had with it, and finish by giving your recommendation for other readers. Write your **review**.

My most recent discovery as an English learning tool is called 'write an improve'.It is basically an online website where you have a wide selection of topics on which you can write paragraphs with approximately twohoundred to threehoundred words. When you enter the website for the first time you either create a profile to save your learning progress or just write a paragraph without signing up, but in that case it would not be saved for later acceses. Then you choose from four different skill levels, either beginner, intermediate, advanced and business or, if you are not training for anything specific, the 'just for fun' option. As a result the website recommets the most suitable tasks for you and there are many to choose from. If you have decided what your text will be about, you just start writing and even if you struggle with your time management there is a tool for you, a timer. After finishing your task you click on the check button down below and the programme gives you feedback shortly afterwards. It rates your skill level in that specific paragraph, checks for spelling mistakes or the wrong usage of words and even points out which sentences may need some improvement. Another huge benefit is that you can improve your written text as often as you like and by doing that learn from your old mistakes. The only downsite of this website is, that you just see what is wrong and not how to improve it, but all in all it is a great learning website.

Your English teacher told you about Write and Improve and said you should use it to practise and improve your English writing.<U+00A0> Your teacher has asked you to write **a report** about your experience with Write and Improve, describing what you liked or didn<U+2019>t like about it and why. Experience with Write and Improve Introduction  This report is about my personal experience with the Cambridge University's Write and Improve pregram available online which  helps people in improving their writing skills.  Course  Cambridge Write and Improve portal has very user friendly design which helps the user to choose their level of writing which is divided into four parts Beginner, intermediate, Advanced and Professional. Each category has lots of topics. I was practicing at intermediate level . Once you are done with writing about the given topic you have to submit your content and after some time you get feedback from the portal about your writing quality and with the feedback you can get a fair idea about your approach towards the topic.   Variety in workbooks. In write and Improve we get variety of different topics. Some topics are easy and some are difficult. It has something for everyone who really wants to improve their written English.  Conclusion I would strongly recommend this exercise to all the students of my class and to others . You can try it irrespective of your age.

Many people believe that it is important to always tell the truth. In your opinion, is it ever acceptable to tell a lie?<U+00A0> Explain your answer giving reasons and specific examples.

In general I believe that telling the truth will always be the right decision, but there are exceptions. In the following essay I would like to propose my thoughts on the topic 'why it is important to always tell the truth'. Every relationship, which one is irrelevant, is based on trust and lies, even if they are not harmful ones by themselves, are destroying this fundamental part, because dealing with trust issues in a relationship is not healthy for anyone and will ultimately cause the end of a friendship or a relationship between girlfriend and boyfriend. Besides being a destructive mannner in relationships with others, being untruthful is a huge burden for your own mental health as well. It takes a lot to prevent a lie from being coughed, for instance a lot of new believable lies, causing a lot of pressure on the liar himself. Telling the truth might not be the most comfortable way to go at first, but it sure is over time compared to keeping a lie alive. Most of us know the relieve caused by a lie being coughed and the truth coming out, which is great but whereas you could feel it a lot earlier by telling the truth to begin with . But as I implied at the beginning, there are certain situations where it is acceptable to lie. Those are if you have to prevent something bad to happen from a third person, like keeping a secret for someone even if another person asks if you know about something.

You receive this email from your English pen friend: Hi, It was my birthday on Saturday. I went with my family to a restaurant. After the meal they all sang Happy Birthday to me and we had a cake with candles. What do people do to celebrate birthdays in your country? Is it the same or different? Write soon! Jack Write an email to your friend.

Hi Jack,  Thank you for your message and let me wish you a happy birthday.  Now, let's see how we celebrate a birthday in France. To be honest, that is very similar as your description. Indeed, especially when we are  children, we used to have a cake made by our mother with candies. But generally, we celebrate our birthday twice.   The first time with our friends from school. All mothers drop their child at our house and then we spend the whole day playing a variety indoor or outdoor games. Each guest brings a gift, often a toy, and we have the opportunity to use it after eating the homemade cake.    The second time, we celebrate our anniversary only with our family either at home or in a restaurant.   One thing in common can be observed. Both of them include an 'Happy Birthday' song.  Then, when we become adults, everyone celebrate his or her birthday according to his or her mood. Some still want to have a party with their friends.The others will be more likely to do a merer celebration only surrounded by their family.  Our culture is close to yours regarding this important stage of life, as you could find out.  I'm looking forward to hearing from you Seb

Some people believe that it is good for students to have the same teacher for several years. Others think students benefit more from having new teachers each year. Which do you think is better? Give specific reasons to support your opinion.

In recent years, we can discover an important debate on education. While some think that it is better for students to be followed by  the same teacher throughout his schooling, others believe that students benefit more from having new teachers each year. Let's see what are the students advandages of both of these perspectives.  On the one hand, we can consider having the same teacher for several years can be of benefit. Indeed, having a good student-teacher relationship, for several years, promotes trust. Increasing his trust, a student is more likely to succeed.  However,  having a good relationship with a professor can't be a certitude. Indeed, like other human interactions, a student may not match with his professor. If this situation arises, how the student  can benefit from the teaching. He or she suffers more. Thereupon, failure may occur.  In the other hand, having different teacher can be an opportunity, for the student, to have access to different points of views. Generally, listening to different people allows us to build our own perspective with shades. Let's go further away saying this promote the understanding between people coming from different cultures.  Finally, to my opinion, pupils can benefit from having the same teacher. Indeed, trust and confidence are part of the success for the youngsters. But throughout the schooling, it's necessary to have access to many views points for building a critical thinking.

Can you believe that? You know that my parents only allow me to go out with my friends once in a blue moon so you can imagine how excited I was when I found out they would let me go this time. Well, when I knew The Killers were coming to town I immediately bought the tickets. I decided to make a plan in order to convince my parents to let me go and it actually worked... As you know The Killers are one of my favourite bands. They are American and they don't often give concerts in Europe, so I guess I couldn't miss this one for nothing. Looking forward to meeting you soon Lots of love

You have had a class discussion on the importance of exercise. Now your teacher has asked you to write a composition answering the following question: _Exercise is important for our health, but are there things that are more important?_ Write your composition.

Physical exercise is important, however I think there is something more important than physical exercise, and nutrition and rest are more. The detailed reasons are as follows: At first, I have to admit that exercise is good for health. It is helpful to strengthen our bodies and spirits. Additionally, it is useful to change paces and reduce stress. In modern society, it is very important. However, I point out that it is based on nutrition and rest. If you do not eat sufficiently, physical exercise does not performance effectively because muscles need protein while increase your its strength. Moreover, vitamins are also needed for support. Of course, water is vital. In those day, you should not drink while exercising in Japan. It is ridiculous. If you exercise without water, you will get heat stroke. Besides, rest is vital for your health. After you take physical training, you should take rest. If you exercise continuously, your muscles cannot develop fully. Cool-down is vital after exercise. In conclusion, nutrition and rest are essential to maximizing the effectiveness of exercise.

Because of the negative effects on health of an inactive lifestyle, all university students and school children should be forced to do sports activities at least 3 times per week. Do you agree? Write your **argumentative essay**.

I would like to give arguments against forcing students to do sports activities three times per week. First of all I agree with critics, who are in favor of such a rule, to the point that it has negative effects on the health of students, if they are not active enough, but forcing them to do something is a bit too much in my eyes. It may cause another new problem, that students might lose the joy at doing sports, because they have no other choice. Of course, there has to be a solucion, preventing the students from suffering of health problems, but I believe there are better ways to do such things. Assuming that there would be sports activities included in the schoolday, it will lead to more classes, causing the students to stay in school longer and in the end to study later at the evening and lack of sleep does also have negative effects on health. My proposal would be to sensitize the students to the topic, instead of making decisions over their heads. Because if they would understand the importance of being active, they might adapt certain habits to their everyday life. That would be in so far more beneficial than forcing them to do something, that they could decide which kind of sports activity they prefer and when they have the time to do them. That would also teach them to be more independent and to take responsibility for their own life and health, because after school nobody will take interest in how active they are. Of course there had to be a seminar on how to achieve a more active lifestyle, but that would only take up one or two afternoons. Besides that every school and university may consider to establish an office to help the students with that quest and keeps track on how they are doing. In conclusion, something has to be done, but using force is never the right choice.

Some people believe zoos are good places for people to learn about animals. Other people believe animals belong in nature and it is wrong to keep them in zoos. What do you think? Explain, giving specific reasons for your choice.

Lately, we can observe an interesting debate about how an animal should be considered in our society. Governments begin to design, to create laws to ensure protection of animals . Many activist groups are taking action against the food industry to denounce how much animals suffer as a result of their practices. These activits are talking about animals mistrating. Over and over, animals is considered more and more as a human be. This situation highlights the question of the interest of zoos in our society. Facing some people who believe it is a good place to learn about animals, other are campaigning for a zoo ban. Finally, this debate has forced individuals to question the violence of civilization.   First of all, to my opinion, zoo can be considered as a cultural site like a museum. Indeed, it allows people to open mind, to learn something new and finally to increase their personal culture. But it seems important to have a good approach when we enter inside. We should not consume a zoo as a product. Nor should we behave like a fair. To avoid this behaviour, zoos need to put more emphasis on how they care for animals rather than using them at fairs. This would improve their image in society.  Second, the behaviour of activists can also raise certain questions. Denaturing must of course be denounced. But activists tend to move away from simple denunciation. Many citizens equate their actions with terrorism. In fact, activists can appear harmful because they reconsider, sometimes violently, our way of life. They may be uncompromising in their attitude.  You are either with them or against them. Also, one question remains unanswered in their speeches: Can we be sure that living in the wild is safer than living in a zoo for some animals?  To conclude, it seems that communication is the key of the problem. Both of the actors described, would benefit  from  improving their speeches. Indeed, highlighting the happiness of animals, their speeches appeared more perceptible and more effective.

Would you like to live a long, calm life until 100 years old or would you prefer a shorter life but much more intense. Decide and explain your reasons.

Who wants to live forever? Nowadays most people live for enjoying their lives. In the past, our grandparents and parents used to lead a hard life in order to build a house and give their families some comfort. Nowadays nobody wants to sacrifice themselves in order to spend all their lives working for something which is going to be left behind when they die. Younger people would rather live for the moment than think about long term plans and dedicate themselves to boring lifestyles. Fortunately, we have reached a time when we can do almost everything that we want to do. We have grown up believing that we can dream high and, if we fight for them, we can make our dreams come true.  Despite this awareness, we have never been so busier and felt so lonely as we do now. Families struggle to spend some quality time together, however, school and work take most of their time. Not only do people work from 9 to 7 every day, they also use their free time at the weekend to solve problems related to work.  There is definitely the need to take some action so as to prevent us from spending our whole lives dedicated to work and seeing time go by without being able to do anything against it.

Some students choose to study in another country for a time during high school or university. What do you think are the advantages and disadvantages of studying abroad?

Since the early 2000's, the Internet has broken all borders around the world. One lives in the age of exchange. Information,  knowledge, skills are more and more important resources. Nowadays, social medias and digital applications allow global companies to pick up the best candidates. In this context, I 'm going to present, to my opinion, the advantages and the disadvantages for studying abroad for students.  Firstly, I think that studying abroad is an opportunity. Soft skills are as important as technical skills. Travels promote the development of these soft skills. When a student chooses to study abroad, he goes out his or her zone of comfort. He or she has to adapt to  a new environment and find out solutions by himself  in many daily situations such as rent an apartment, find a job,...Also, discovering a new culture, meeting natives allows him or her to be an open-minded person. Of course, learning a new language takes an important place in this students development. The ability to adapt, to understand others perspectives, to go out of the box and to speak many languages are for sure great advantages.  The main global companies are looking for these soft skills when they receive applications.  However, this situation has led to many inequalities among students around the world. In fact, only some students will  be  able to travel or to have access to these new technologies that is to say more likely students from developed countries. The others will remain outside the current requirements of the labour market. Low-paid and unattractive jobs will be their only job opportunities. The main danger is to create a social divide between peoples and continents.  Finally, I believe that, studying abroad, offers great personal opportunities but, at the same time, produces inequalities and social risks between students, i.e. between cultures. We must be careful not to create a two-tier society.

Your town council is thinking about banning the use of mobile phones on public transport and in shops and restaurants.<U+00A0> Write a letter to the town council giving your opinion about this and why you think it is or is not a good idea.

Dear Town Council, I would like to support your suggestion about banning the use of smartphones on public transportation and in restaurants and shops. Primarily because I think that we spend way too much time on social media or on our phone in general and if we would concentrate on having conversations again, for instance in a restaurant, our social life would benefit extremely. But besides hemming our communication, our smartphone use can also be a huge safety threat in public. On the on hand for our privacy, because with them anyone is able to take pictures or videos of strangers and put them on the internet or share them with his or her friends, even without that persons approval. On the other hand is it dangerous for your physical health in various ways. Of course is constantly checking our phone neither good for your eyes nor for your brain, but such a prohibitation could barely help with those concerns. Although what it may help with are reducing the many accidents caused because someone is distracted by his or her phone. For example those incidents where someone is not paying attention while walking over the street or stepping into a train and falls, would be prevented. Personally I do not really see the necessarity for such a ban in shops, because it helps with neither of the other concerns, but that is just my view on the topic. In general I am supportive of that idea and hope it will be introduced apperantly. Sencerily, Nele

Your English teacher told you about Write and Improve and said you should use it to practise and improve your English writing.<U+00A0> Your teacher has asked you to write **a report** about your experience with Write and Improve, describing what you liked or didn<U+2019>t like about it and why. Finish by saying whether you would recommend your classmates to try it. Write your **report**.

Due to your recommendation to use Write and Improve on the Internet, here is a report about my experience. I'm going to describe what I liked and what I disliked after using this Internet site to practise and improve my English writing.  In fact , this site offers many advantages. First of all, it is free. It's a very important point for students owning few economical resources. You have access to many diifferent topics according to your level.  Then, the website's appearance is clear and friendly-manner. Indeed, you watch  easily the different options offered to understand quickly how to use the site to improve your English skills and to set your goals. Finally, you don't have to be patient to get your essays results. As soon as, you click on the 'Check Button', you know, right now, your rating and the site highlights the incorrect sentences of your text.  To be honest, I have noticed a very few disadvantages. I have only one regret. As I have just mentioned previsouly, the website automatically highlights your incorrect sentences. However, sometimes it may be difficult for a student, to find the correct construction of the sentence without using a translator site such as Google Translate. But even if we copy its translation in our text, we can get a worse grade. To my opinion, this situation might be quite confusing for a learner.  A learner cannot master all the different aspects of a language. Certainly, many sides remain unknown.  To conclude, as the list of the advantages is bigger than the sole disavantage observed, I highly recommend my classmate to try this website. It helps me a lot.

Write about a holiday that you went on that was really important to you. Say where you went and what you saw, and explain why it was the best holiday you ever had.

It's completely different than to live this moment alone. We saw many places and sites such as the English Museum, the Wimbledon Stadium, the City's towers, Buckingam Palace,... Indeed, London seems a city that never sleeps contrarary to Madrid that wakes up only in the afternoon and at night.  To conclude, it was the best holiday I ever had. In fact, I'm planning another trip to London. But this time, I want to be able to speak more fluenty with the natives for a better experience.

You have had a class discussion on the purpose of television. Now your teacher has asked you to write a composition answering the following question: _Television entertains, but can it also educate?_ Write your composition.

You see a request for articles in a magazine: We invite you to write about: _The Future of Travel_. In what ways do you think travel will be different in the future? In what ways might it still be the same? The writer of the best article will win a prize! Write your article.

Future travel might be not so different than nowadays. I mean the basic principle about functioning of aircraft I do not think will be different, but maybe them will be a little bit faster and less contaminant. Trains will be faster than now too.  So, I imagine transport more efficient and more complicated due to the geopolitical situation will be complicated. So, passengers wont travel easily between different countries. Furthermore, after this pandemic in terminals and stations security control will be very detailed. For instance, security will take human body temperature. But, maybe will increase rural tourism or local tourism. So there are some different interesting ways to travel that probably will represent a great trend in the future.  It would be better talking about an antique manner that we have lost in the last century which was the main way to travel: own legs. An example of that is 'El camino de Santiago' which is famous in all the world. One of the main reasons is because people discover the slow tourism. Furthermore, people are discovering that is much more exciting travel cycling or sealing. Those are good way traveling keeping touch with the environment. So, in the future the real revolution about travel will be to come back to the past.

Books are understood as a certain number of pages that are bundled into a volume. That has different kinds of knowledge to be kept for thousands of years. Most medical doctors want to work in cities where they will make a lot of money. Yet in many rural areas there are not enough doctors. What are the reasons for this problem? How can it be solved?

I have a scientific background, which is why I like medicine as a science, but I never wanted to become a doctor despite the fact that a medical degree is one of the most valued degrees, and many students compete to get a place to study it. But the most of new doctors want to work in cities, mainly in a big hospital with a lot of medical devices and protected into a team of workmates with whom can discuss and compare decisions, and at the same time getting a bigger income and living in a city. Accurately this is a real problem for rural life and for people who live in the countryside because actually there are not enough doctors in many rural areas, patients can live separated for long distances and the doctor have to drive from a place to other to assist them, in addition to this they are completely alone without modern devices and having only their personal opinion against the disease. In my opinion a good way to solve this situation could be increasing the amount of money that rural doctors earn and putting enough means at their disposition to make tests that allow them determinate different diseases in their patients.

Some high schools have a requirement that students must complete a certain amount of volunteer work in order to graduate. What do you think about this type of requirement? Give details to support your opinion.

Now I am retired, but I was a teacher of mathematics for thirty-nine years in a high school, my daily routine inmy work was based on not very long explanations and a lot of exercises, most of them compulsory for each student, but I liked to propose some of them as voluntary and complementary work. I know that today some schools require to their students a certain amount of volunteer work, I believe that I can say I was a precursor of  this way to work that is followed now by many schools. The volunteer work for students had only advantages for me in my career, because I always though that the main way to learn maths is  doing exercises as much as possible, in addition, this practice with specialized problems requires more attention for the students who will improve their learning more quickly, and for the teacher it is a perfect way to accurately determine the interest and level of knowledge of the students who participate in these volunteer work. I do not want to finish without mentioning the enjoyment from doing some different exercises than those marked in the textbook.

In some schools, students must study music and learn to play a musical instrument. In other schools, studying music may not be required or there may be no music classes at all. Do you think all students should have to study music? Support your opinion with reasons and examples.

Many years ago the role of the music in learning changed completely, before that music was absolutely forgotten in curriculums and programs, being restricted to Schools of Music. In the earlies 90, music was included like a subject for all students in Secondary Schools, and a controversial situation was produced, because this measure was received in a very different way in each centre, while in some of them the new was happily accepted, in others was hardly critised, depending on the importance that music was considered in theirs, so it was possible to find diverse options from some where the music was not only compulsory but it was recommended that students learnt to play some musical instrument to other ones where the music was treated like a minor option. Today, this situation is completely regulated, and learning to play an instrument considered like a complementary activity. There is a Spanish saying that says ' In the middle the virtue is', and in my opinion it is completely appropriated in this case, studying music may be very interesting and useful for students but in a fair measure, like a subject more, and afterward each student will have freedom for leaning or not any musical instrument.

Most medical doctors want to work in cities where they will make a lot of money. Yet in many rural areas there are not enough doctors. What are the reasons for this problem? How can it be solved?

Healthcare is one of the main necessities of a country to flourish and provide it to its citizens completely. But for over some time, it is being observed that the system is failing to provide that security to the Doctors and as an outcome of it is a major outflow of highly qualified doctors to the other countries.  We need to locate the main reasons behind the outflow of Doctors and simultaneously, we need to resolve this problem. Most of the Doctors move out of the country to find better working opportunities that can bring their knowledge into application and they are valued and respected for that. It will be unfair to say that there are no opportunities in our country but they are very sparsely available.  Many people go to other countries to earn good money and the same happens with the Doctors as well. They opt for going out to earn money and a lot of it. If we compare the ratio of their earnings in and out of the country then we will find that they earn huge money in other countries.  Some doctors don't go to other countries to earn money, but they find research work more attractive in those countries in comparison to home country. This can be taken care of if the governmnet put money in research projects locally and build a good research environment. This step will help the government in keeping the Doctors to domestic hospitals, but it will help in shaping the innovation field which would lead to the overall growth of the country.

My last vacation I went to Huatulco. Huatulco is a handsome big town in Oaxaca, in the southeast of Mexico . The weather is very hot, ideal to enjoy a great landscape, maybe the best is an awesome long blue sea, ready to be surfed.  In the sea was seeing a great variety of marine animals, fish, whales and turtles. I was impacted with the Huatulco woman, gorgeous a short young girls are in the town and beach. Is learning to speak a foreign language as important these days as it was in the past? Write an **essay** giving your opinion.

Learning to speak foreign languages is definitely more important these days than it was before for a simple reason. These days we have much more opportunities to use them. Internet opened so many doors. We have access to sources that interest us in many languages, so it's useful to know them. Because of the internet we can communicate with people from around the world - and that's why we learn their languages. In past years learning other languages might be regarded as just a hobby. Not everyone who learned foreign language had the opportunity to go abroad and use it there.  Now we can use foreign languages without leaving our homes. We can make friends with people from distant countries.  These days people also travel more, so knowing  at least a few commonnest words in the language of the country you plan to  go is useful,

You have been asked to write a short __article__ for your school magazine with the title: *My favourite season of the year.* Describe your favourite season __and__ explain why it is so special for you. __Write your article.__

My favourite season of the year without the least doubt is summer. The main reason for that is that I simply like when it's warm, and summer is the warmest season in Poland. The average temperature is over 20 degrees which is perfect for me.  The days are long, it's only getting dark at about 10 pm. I like it when it's bright, it boosts my energy. What I also love about summer is the summer nature. In this period of the year nature is in bloom. All plants are already green and the flowers are so colorful. They look  beautiful. Another thing is that in summer I don't have to put on too many clothes, just a pair of jeans and a t-shirt and I'm ready to leave. And also long days and warm weather encourage me to take more walks and even a summer rain isn't the obstacle.

You see a request for articles in a magazine: We invite you to write about: _The School of the Future_. In what ways do you think schools will be different in the future? In what ways might they still be the same? The writer of the best article will win a prize! Write your article.

First of all, speaking about future we should specify what we mean by future, do we mean years or decades. It seems to me that  in short term there will not be dramatic changes as concerns schools.  A huge change has already been made in recent years thanks to the internet. Students have much easier access to various information, they don't have to go to the library to get them, there are many useful and reliable internet websides which are a lot of help. I think that in future the use of  internet in schools will be even more expanded. Online lessons may be more common. As concerns teaching content, it's probable that learners will be taught more practical knowledge than theory. Instead of making children remember advanced mathematics formulas and schemes, they will taught how to cook numerous dishes from different cuisine or sew clothes by themselves. Special emphasis should be put on  classes where children are taught how to accept themselves , boost their self-confidence and be stress resistant. The only thing will remain the same - learning! Nobody will do it for children.

In some offices, employees work in enclosed workstations or cubicles. Other offices have a more open design, in which there are no walls separating employees from their coworkers. Which type of arrangement do you think is most effective? Explain, giving reasons to support your answer.

From many years, people generally work in offices, there are different jobs in which employees must work in the same place staying there many hours a day; The office could be designed according to very different models. In some of them, co-workers must be kept separate, even isolated in the rooms, because they must help people with private matters, although after that they solve problems together helping others. On the other hand, it is preferable to work together in a large room, because it is important that they are continuously communicate between different colleagues who pursue a common goal. Finally, since the irruption of computers in the labor market it is increasingly common for officers to do their work from home, avoiding commuting to the office without the consequent loss of time in transportation.  Today, due to the coronavirus pandemic, more and more people work from home following official recommendations, to avoid becoming infected and spreading the dangerous epidemic.

Some people believe zoos are good places for people to learn about animals. Other people believe animals belong in nature and it is wrong to keep them in zoos. What do you think? Explain, giving specific reasons for your choice.

You can't learn about the animals in zoos. People go just for fun. If you want to know about nature, you will search on the Internet or cinema or in another place. Zoos responds to a necessity of entreteinment.   Unlike we can analyse the figures of national parks and natural reserves, when the animals can live in they own terms. The natural reserves are special design for watching and studying  nature and learn more about animals behavor.   Yelowstone park is a good example to illustrate my idea. In the recent years, this park have contributed for the biological investigation. For instance, the paper of 'wolves and the relationship between predators and speces control' explore the impact of the wolves and explains how the predators deliver a huge role inside the environmental.   Zoos doesn't expose the real condtions about the life of animals, it just shows an artificial bioma.   In summary I think zoos aren't good places for learn about animals. Those kinds of places should close, because it doesn't contribute to investigations. Actually, the zoos is one of the most dangerous places for animals.

Video games are very popular with children. However, some parents feel that video games can have a negative impact on their children, but others believe that they may have some positive effects. How do you feel about children playing video games? Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.

We need to move on the new era. Video Games can offer a new way to learn. The parents have to incorporate it in her children routine rather than hide their children of technology.   Video Games teach children how to resolve complex prbolems in a specific context. According to a study of the Texas College, children are developing new skills with video games. For instance, Minecraft explains how to build a person inside society, and another study of the National University of Colombia demonstrated that fifty percent of their students learnt English with video games. It is false that video games can have a negative impact in children's education.   Instead the benefits of the video games, parents have to create good habits with their children. If they let them alone with ganes, then they would have educational problems. Parents can't pretend that video games will educate their children. The real problem is forget their role in the educational process.   They have to privided time and  ourchase the abilities to understand the children's necessities in education. You can't wipe out the technologies in the children process. They have more work to do in the new era. They doesn't struggle with the future, prepare themselves.

You see a request for articles in a magazine: We invite you to write about: _The School of the Future_. In what ways do you think schools will be different in the future? In what ways might they still be the same? The writer of the best article will win a prize! Write your article.

The school of the future will be different. We may not be flying with rocket boots to school, but there will be big changes.   Our school will have much cooler and newer subjects than nowadays. Those subjects will connect to all the new jobs that have appeared around that time. Subjects like 3D-printing, drone racing or Physical education via virtual reality may exist. I do think that we still keep our basic subjects such as Maths, English, history and physics, which will change and develop with its time of course.   Schools will be much more inovative and will use technology a lot more. I think more teachers will work from home and give their lessons via skype for example. Our staff for the cafeteria and cleaning may be replaced with robots, so everything can become more cheap and quicker.

You have had a class discussion on the purpose of television. Now your teacher has asked you to write a composition answering the following question: _Television entertains, but can it also educate?_ Write your composition.

Everybody has television nowadays. Some people believe that a television is just entertaining whereareas others believe that it can educate us. In my opinion can we eductate  ourselves by watching television.   When we watch for example a gameshow where people need to answer difficult questions in order to win something, we are entertained. However we are also educating ourselves with all the new facts we get to know from all the questions answered by the participants.   We can also learn from documentaries or scientific program on television. The purpose of a documentary or scientific program is to educate its viewer about a certain subject. After watching a documentary we will know a lot more, and have we become a little smarter.  By watching soaps we will learn how to cope or not to cope with difficult situations or problems in our daily lives.  To summarize this short: A television can educate us in different ways by watching various television programs.

In the recent times, television is use for both: education and enterteintment. The problmes is that television is using to educate people to hate culture and knowledge.

You see a request for articles in a magazine: We invite you to write about: _The School of the Future_. In what ways do you think schools will be different in the future? In what ways might they still be the same? The writer of the best article will win a prize! Write your article.

In recent years, the advent of the Internet and computers has brought a lot of changes in school. Also, the evolution of society forced teachers to adapt their communication to the students. We have moved from paper, pen, physical punishment by teachers at the beginning of the 20th century, to the use of electronic devices and greater attention to student confidence. In this context, a question arises : What will the school of the future be ? In the following paragraphes, we will think about in what ways schools might be the same and different in the future.  First of all, the advent of the Internet has brought about profound changes in teachers' work and students' attitudes. In fact, teachers have had to use new technology as a new way to pass on knowedge more efficiency.  Without the Internet, the school would seem totally disconnected from the real world and would lose all credibility. Moreover, using the Internet in class is certainly the only way to teach. Millenials grew with the Internet.  In this context, it is well known that children have a low attention span.. It is difficult for them to maintain their concentration on one subject over a long period of time.  Teachers need to adapt the way they teach to this situation. The use of the Internet will probably be the same in schools in the future.  But the job of the teacher may be different. In fact, home-school is more and more developed thanks to many websites. The students might not need to go to school to learn something. Virtual and distance learning could be the next way to learn. Students will choose between  teachers all over the world according to their expectations.

You have been asked to write a short __article__ for your school magazine with the title: *My favourite season of the year.* Describe your favourite season __and__ explain why it is so special for you. __Write your article.__

There are four seasons in the world. They are spring, summer, autumn and winter. But in our country, Myanmar, there are only three seasons. They are the hot season, the rainy season and the cold season. Each season has enjoyable weathers. Among them, my favorite season of the year is the cold season. It  is from November to February. In the cold season, the weather is very cool and pleasant. Because of the cold weather, we can live comfortably in the day time and sleep soundly at night. It is also a good time to travel from one place to another because there is no dust or no mud in this season. It is a good season both for old people and for students. The old people walk in the morning to be healthy and we, the students usually get up early and study our lessons to pass the examination easily. It is also a good time to study because our body is active, our mind is clear and our brain is fresh. These are the reasons why the cold season is my favorite season of the year.

Because of the negative effects on health of an inactive lifestyle, all university students and school children should be forced to do sports activities at least 3 times per week. Do you agree? Write your **argumentative essay**.

Forcing university students and school children to do sports is not a violation of their freedom to choose the life they wish. The lifestyle our young people conduct freaks me out and taking action is a must for their own good. Doing sports does not boil down to whether they want to do or not, it is a prerequisite to establish a healthy society. Three ideas are to discuss in this piece of paper. Doing sports must be obligatory in any curriculum, the benefits of doing sports are undeniable, and students must not be left for their own devices.  To begin with, any successful curriculum must include sports. Sports at our universities and schools are not just for embellishment but an integrated component in education. However, forcing students to do sports does not imply to force them violently. Some tricks to adopt, for instance, can be in a form of initiatives like giving our students the freedom to choose the type of sport they fancy. Also important is the idea of competition. Students can be lured by rewarding competitions.   As to the benefits of doing sports, they are too many to count in this piece of paper. First, doing sports are a good shield against addiction to alcohol or smoking opium. Second, doing sports results in having a healthy society. A healthy society is an active and productive one. Third, research shows that students who do sports regularly have a positive view about life and high spirit. This is of vital importance for their school performance.  Nevertheless, forcing university students and school students to do sport is not the end; it is the beginning. Universities and schools should accommodate students with decent and healthy food, clean cloakroom gym and so on and so forth. Knowing the financial background of our students is a must too.   In fine, forcing students to do sport is for their own good after all. Students' current lifestyle is detrimental and poisonous and forcing them to do sports implicitly is our duty.
