* How often do you use a computer? * What do you usually use a computer for? * Tell us about what you enjoy doing most with a computer.

Well, I use my computer all the time now. I started to use it when I was fifteen to play games and use social media, but, when I started college I needed to begin to use to study, to do my homework and essays. When I finished my career and started my doctoral thesis, I started to live glued to my computer to do my thesis. Now I use my computer for many things, although mainly for work, in order to write my articles and studies. I can't wonder how I would do everything I do without a computer. It's a very useful thing, and makes my life and work a piece of cake. Well, I enjoy my work, but I enjoy more use my computer to watch TV series and movies; to read books and the news, and to take a look to social media sites. How I said before, I live glued to my computer, literally. Just now I'm using it to study English, to write this essay for this writing practice. Without it, I wouldn't manage to learn English so fast how I'm doing it.

Hi there, Matt, I know it. I'm a little upset about the end of the holidays. I usually got melancholy in these days. I have to say goodbye to my family and friends and get back home for the school. It's a pretty awful experience. Well, we can do nothing about it. Yes? Will you have to improve in maths and history? How bad were your grades last year? Yes, I need to improve my English because I want to make an intership in London next year. I need to learn a lot. I'm going to join the English club at school and enroll in a language academy. However, I really need to lose my fear of speak English in front other people. I know a lot, I can understand almost everything people say in English, but I don't feel sure enough to try to speak with other people in English. Maybe you could help me with this.

Hi there, Guess what? I just finished to watch that movie I told you about it. It was such a wonderful movie! I wish you'd come with me to the cinema to see it. You must enjoyed it a lot. You receive this email from your English pen friend: Hi, It was my birthday on Saturday. I went with my family to a restaurant. After the meal they all sang Happy Birthday to me and we had a cake with candles. What do people do to celebrate birthdays in your country? Is it the same or different? Write soon! Jack Write an email to your friend.

Hi there! I'm glad your birthday was so cool. Well, is the same, more or less. I think the sort of celebration is mostly up to the person, and not in the country (or not in this case). My birthdays have been the same as your last birthday. However, I know many people that celebrates his birthdays in a different way. For my uncle's last birthday we all went to the beach, in order to have a beach day instead a traditional celebration. For my sister's last birthday, she rent a bar to celebrate a big party, with a lot of buff, friends and even a DJ. And for my grandmother last birthday, all my relatives, my grandmother and I went to a cabin at the mountains, to spend a whole weekend together. My grandmother was very happy to see all us together and with her. Therefore, I think that in my country we celebrate birthdays in the same way than in your country. However, I know that in other countries birtdays are pretty different. I watched a long time ago a documentary about this, and it was interesting to see how people celebrate and conceive this date.

They made a lot of tests, and it finally result that she had high blood pressure. She is fine now due to the new medicament that the doctor prescribe her. However, I had to spend all the evening and part of the night in the hospital. That's why I couldn't go to your party. How was the party? It was fun? Did you do something special? Besides, I need to compensate you for not going to your party. Maybe I can invited you to eat or dinner in a great Chinese restaurant that is close to my house. They make the best lemon chicken that I've never eaten, and their rice three delicacies is wonderful too. Well, I'm waiting for your answer. See you soon.

Your friend Rie sends you an email:<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> _Hi, Can you come to my house for dinner tomorrow? What do you like to eat? Come at 7 o'clock. See you. Rie_ Write a note to Rie. Hi there, Rie, How wonderful! Of course I'll be there! However, maybe I'll arrive a bit late, since I have to work until half past six. My boss changed my working hours last month. Now I get off work later, and I start to work later though. So I can't be there at 7 o'clock, but I'll be there only a few minutes later. Shall I bring something to drink? Well, I don't need nothing special. I'll be happy to spend the night with you. However, and only if you didn't mind, I would be glad to eat again that fantastic roast chicken that you made me years ago. Do you remember? I ate so much chicken that I had to lie down on your bed. For dessert, I think I will bring something. There are a great bakery near my job where they make a wonderful chocolate cake. Do you like chocolate? If you didn't like it, I could buy a different cake. Which type of cake is your favorite? Well, I see you tomorrow.

Your neighbour is going to look after your house while you are on holiday. Write a note to tell him what he must do. For example, you can write about: * keys<U+00A0> * plants<U+00A0> * pets<U+00A0> * mail

Hi there, Luis, I'm very grateful that you're going to look after my house while I'm on holiday. It's a very kind gesture, and I intend to return you the favor when you want it. Would you like that I bring to you some gifts? Well, you asked me to tell you what you must do while I'm out. It's only a few things, don't worry. First, you must water my plants. I have a few in the kitchen, in the balcony and in the terrace. However, you must not water my cactus, since they don't need much water. Besides, you should feed my pets. I only have a hamster and a couple of colour fish. Since I'm going to be away only a few days, you don't have to clean the fishbowl or the cage. You only have to give them their feed. Apart from this, I don't need anymore. If you could collect my mail it would be perfect, but this is not necessary. And, of course, if my house starts to burn, call the fire brigade. I'm kidding, but if this happends, please, call them. Thank you very much for everything. See you when I'll return home.

Read this email from your cousin, Ana. Hi, I saw your mum yesterday. She told me you are learning English. That<U+2019>s good news! But I want to know why you are studying English. Why is learning the English language important to you? I wish you luck! Ana **Write an email to Ana and answer her question.**

Hi there, Ana, Yes, she has already told me that she had seen you while she was shopping. Did you see her new haircut? I didn't stop tell her to get a new haircut and she finally listened to me. She seemed very older with her old haircut, and someone had to tell her the truth about it. Well, I want to learn English for several reasons. First, I think that knowing other languagues can offer you many job opportunities. Besides, you'll be able to travel around without any problem knowing English. And, of course, you can enjoy movies, TV Series and books in English. I already know enough to understand what the characters say in some TV Series, and I think it's quite better that listened to the translated version. However, there are another reason. I've discovered that I really enjoy learning English. When I was a child, I hated how they taught us English at school. I was actually a bad students, and I always got bad degrees in this subject. However, I've found some ways to study English that I really enjoy, and I don't need to take a book and only study grammatical lessons.

Write a paragraph for a brochure about your home town. You must include TWO of these things: <U+00B7> Information about **important landmarks** <U+00B7> Information about **shopping** and **accommodation** <U+00B7> Information about **parks, museums** and **restaurants** <U+00B7> Information about **night-time entertainment.**

I don't want to write about my home town, so I'm gonna tell you about a city where I've gone on vacation: Gijon. Gijon is a coast city of the north of Spain. It's a fantastic touristic city with many things to do, especially in summer. There are two main and big beaches where you can find incredible waves all year. Besides, in this city you can find many teathers, museums and even one of the biggest aquarium of Europe. Unless you go there for at least four or five days, it's impossible that you see everything. Due to is a touristic city, in Gijon you can find many hotels and motels to stay. The quality of the place where you could stay will only depend on your economical possibilities. For this very reason, there are many and wonderful restaurants. In these restaurants you can find the typical food of this region, but there are restaurant of many types. I'm thinking in a great Italian restaurant where I ate the last time I was there. Their pasta and pizzas were marvelous. During the night, you can find some fun in one of the several pubs and bars that you can find in this city, especially near the beach.

A friend from your class, Cristina, had an accident last week.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Now, her doctor says she must stay at home for two weeks. Write a note to Cristina. In the note: * tell her you are sorry about her problem * say what you can do to help her * say when you can visit her. Write about 50 words.

Hello there, Cristina, Carlos just told me about your car accident last week. I didn't emailed you before because I hadn't heard anything until then. I feel very sorry about it. He said that you hurt your leg and one arm in the accident, and that you mustn't leave home for two weeks in order to recover from your injuries. Is that true? I asked him about the accident, but he didn't know anything more. How did it happened? Were you alone when it happened? Did someone else get hurt? I really hope nothing more happened and you'll be totally fine as soon as possible. Until then, I'll be there for you. If you need something, you can call me, and I'll be there in a minute. You were very helpful to me when I broke my leg two years ago, and I plan to return the favor. Besides, I'm used to helping people owing to my job at the Social Center. So, What do you need? By the way, I really want to see you. When could I come over? Cristina must want to come too, since she is your best friend. I'll call her now to tell her about your accident because she mustn't know anything yet. I wish you were better when you read this.

Video games are very popular with children. However, some parents feel that video games can have a negative impact on their children, but others believe that they may have some positive effects. How do you feel about children playing video games? Give specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.

Well, since I was and I'm a video game user, I don't have such a terrible impression about video games, but I recognize their dangers, though. Many people think that you could have many problems, even mental issues, if you play video games. However, in my personal experience, and according to many researchers, playing video games with moderation can help you a lot with stress problems and other behaviors issues. I've always found a way to rest and forget my daily problems playing video games. It's a really fun activity that requires your total attention, so you can turn off your mind for a while. Besides, playing video games can help you to develop many mental and even physical skills. You can improve your reflexes even. It's true that some children can have serious problems with video games, since this activity easily can ditract them from their studies and other responsibilities. However, this isn't really a problem caused by the video games, but for some incredible lazy and careless parents who allow their children to spend most of their time with their video games or phones. Parents must put limits to this activities, and be responsible for their children, and not try to find excuses for their incompetence.

Some people believe zoos are good places for people to learn about animals. Other people believe animals belong in nature and it is wrong to keep them in zoos. What do you think? Explain, giving specific reasons for your choice.

Well, I'm not sure about it. It's true that animals must be in the nature and free. However, the people need to know more about them. How would you teach why is important to take care of the nature to children if you don't show them the animals that they must protect? It's important for all of us to know more to the animal world, to be close to the animals, in order to learn about them and love them more. Besides, the kids love going to the zoo, and their trips at the zoo is a wonderful way for them to learn and have some fun. I think that the real issue is how the animals are looked after in zoos. If they're good places, with enough food and clean water, with enough space to run and make their lives, and with professional veterinarians who take care of the animals, I don't see the problem. However, it's true that in many places on the world, zoos aren't perfect places to the animals. Furthermore, in many zoos are so many animals that it's impossible for their owners to take care of them. So, I think that we must insist on better coditions for the animals who are in the zoos.

Your teacher asks you to write about what you do in your free time.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> Write about:<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> * the things you do in your free time<U+00A0><U+00A0> * when you do these things.<U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0><U+00A0> <U+00A0>Write about 40 words.

I do many things during my free time. However, I don't do the same things every day. I like playing video games since I was a child. I'm used to playing video games at least ten or fifteen minutes daily. I think this is a wonderful way to relax: If I have had a hard and stressful day, I can always find relaxation and peace killing some aliens or driving fast a car in a video game. On the other hand, I really like to do exercise. I didn't use to do exercise, but a few months ago I started to do it and it was wonderful. I feel really well, and I've lost some weight even! Besides, I really like to go out for a walk with my dogs. I have two dogs right now, and they're marvelous. One is pretty old, but the other one is young, and he always want to play with me. The two of them are very affectionate, and they're always behind me, looking for a caress from me. However, if they see me preparing the tub for their monthly bath, I can't find them anywhere.

Write about a holiday that you went on that was really important to you. Say where you went and what you saw, and explain why it was the best holiday you ever had.

Well, I think that my best holiday was during the last summer. This wasn't only for the destination, but for how I was then. Last year was horrible for me. I had a lot of stress at work, but also something worse happended: my mother had a strock. I was there when that happened, and it was terrible. I was really terrified. My mother survived, but she had to do rehabilitation for many months. At the beginning she was very weak and dizzy, and I was alone to look after her. She didn't improve on teraphy until her doctors found that she has depression and anxiety. They gave her some medication, and she started to improve quickly. For this summer she was much better, almost like before the stroke. However, I was exhausted mental and physically. Besides, my work contract had finished. So I was in a moment of change on my life, but without any energy to face it. So, some friends suggested to me to go on a vacation for my own, in order to spend time with myself and recover energies. I wasn't sure at first, but they were totally right. I went for a week to a wonderful place at the coast, and it was healthy for my soul.

You have had a class discussion on the importance of exercise. Now your teacher has asked you to write a composition answering the following question: _Exercise is important for our health, but are there things that are more important?_ Write your composition.

Yes, of course. However, we need to be healthy in order to have a quality of life that allows us to enjoy our lives, and do exercise is a great way to do this. So, is it important to exercise? Yes, but this can't keep us to do other things more important. I've recently started to do exercise in order to be more healthy. I already have thirty years, so I need to be more careful with my health. The truth is I feel great doing exercise, both physically and mentally. I've lost some weight even. However, despite the fact that I exercise, I haven't stopped to eat sweets, pies and pizzas, because I really love that kind of food. Of course, I don't eat those things every day. I've actually made some changes in my diet: I try to eat two pieces of fruit everyday at least. Besides, my dinners are more light: vegetables, purees, grilled fish, salads, this kind of things. And I'm trying to stop eating bread at night. However, I don't want to obsess about be healthy. If one day I want to buy some pie, I'll do it. However, I try to do this punctually, in a special day or something similar.

You see a request for articles in a magazine: We invite you to write about: _The Future of Travel_. In what ways do you think travel will be different in the future? In what ways might it still be the same? The writer of the best article will win a prize! Write your article.

Well, that's a difficult question. I's obvious that the forms and ways of travel will continue to change. We only need to think about how we travel only thirty years ago. We have new means of transport and, undoubtetly, faster than the precedents. If this continue, it's obvious that there will be many different was to travel. However, the different will be determined by how the technology and the environment evolve. If we don't discover new energy resources in order to replace coal, gas and oil, our current means of transport won't be useful anymore. On the other hand, if the environment crisis continue, we should apply raddical actions to reduce pollution, which could determinate how we travel. I can't say how we'll travel in the future, but what I can say without any doubt is that we need to become more aware of the Earth's limits. We should try harder to reduce the use of pollutings means of transport, and start to use public transportation or bykes instead. I personally don't have my own car, and always use buses, the underground and trains to travel.
